org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.finders
Interface AllFinder

All Known Subinterfaces:
CompleteGenericDao, GeneralGenericDao
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseGeneralGenericDao, HibernateCompleteGenericDao, HibernateGeneralGenericDao, JdbcGeneralGenericDao
public interface AllFinder

This Finder provides methods to find all persistent objects of a certain type

Author:
Aaron Zeckoski (aaronz@vt.edu)

Method Summary
<T> int
countAll(Class<T> entityClass)
          Get a count of all items of the type entityClass.
<T> List<T>
findAll(Class<T> entityClass)
          Find all objects of the type entityClass and return them in a List.
<T> List<T>
findAll(Class<T> entityClass, int firstResult, int maxResults)
          Find all objects of the type entityClass and return them in a List, apply limits to the number of items returned.
 

Method Detail

findAll

<T> List<T> findAll(Class<T> entityClass)
Find all objects of the type entityClass and return them in a List.

Parameters:
entityClass - class type of the persistent object
Returns:
a List of 0 or more persistent objects

findAll

<T> List<T> findAll(Class<T> entityClass,
                    int firstResult,
                    int maxResults)
Find all objects of the type entityClass and return them in a List, apply limits to the number of items returned. Order of returned items is not guaranteed.

Parameters:
entityClass - class type of the persistent object
firstResult - the index of the first result object to be retrieved (numbered from 0)
maxResults - the maximum number of result objects to retrieve (or <=0 for no limit)
Returns:
a List of 0 or more persistent objects

countAll

<T> int countAll(Class<T> entityClass)
Get a count of all items of the type entityClass.

Parameters:
entityClass - class type of the persistent object
Returns:
the number of items found
